qas.question: Who returned to Barcelona as head coach?
How long did Enrique 's deal as coach run?
How much did Barcelona pay for Luis Saurez?
Why was Saurez not playing for four months?
Who banned Saurez for four months after he bit another player?

context: Two days later, it was announced that <a0_0>Luis Enrique<a0_0/> would return to Barcelona as head coach, after he agreed to a <a1_0>two-year<a1_0/> deal. He was recommended by sporting director Andoni Zubizarreta, his former national teammate. Following Enrique's arrival, Barcelona broke their transfer record when they paid Liverpool F.C. <a2_0>between €81 to €94 million<a2_0/> for striker Luis Suárez, who was serving a four-month <a3_0>ban from all football<a3_0/>-related activity imposed by the <a4_0>FIFA Disciplinary Committee<a4_0/> after biting Italian defender Giorgio Chiellini during his appearance for Uruguay in a World Cup group stage match.
